name: Meteghan Frenchy's User Experience Simulation
description:
Game not working? Download below!

CONTROLS: Move with the ARROW KEYS (or by clicking)

Interact with the ENTER key (or by clicking on people/objects)

Walk faster with shift

This was a one-day project. There are no goals other than to explore Meteghan Frenchy's, modeled after the iconic store, and interact with people and the environment to hear their stories. The text mostly comes from my friends who shared them with me over social media.

This was made in part to try out RPG Maker MV and learn how to upload a project as a web browser game. Success!
